author: Jamie Crawley
title: Bitcoin DeFi Project Elastos Debuts BTC-Backed Stablecoin BTCD
description: BTCD developer Elastos' aim is to create a digital version of the Bretton Woods system, with BTC at its core rather than gold.
content:
A Bitcoin-blockchain based decentralized finance (DeFi) project debuted a stablecoin fully backed by bitcoin 
 tokens as part of its effort to build a financial system centered on the largest and ol… [+1877 chars]
